actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to increase the natural resources depletion allowance for income tax purposes on oil and gas wells, coal and lignite deposits in the United States.

summary.text: Provides, for income tax purposes, a 44 percent depletion rate on oil and gas wells, and a 20 percent depletion rate on lignite deposits in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to increase the natural resources depletion allowance for income tax purposes on oil and gas wells, coal and lignite deposits in the United States.
